page.title: 14My Job in Longhope
page.content: I work for{J.Constance & Sons Ltd., a firm in{Longhope}over 200 years old. Since 1981 it has altered greatly. It used to be a large sawmill and factory making agricultural handles using local timber.Now much of the site is rented out in units to small firms. My day starts at 07.30. when I get my chainsaw ready and fill up the pickup. I load and deliver the logs I cut the previous day. After my dinner hour I go back to the sawmills to load more logs for delivery. I service the machines and maintain the site. On a Friday I stop at 16.15.,collect my wages and go home. I spend my evening gardening or playing a darts match at the{Manor House Hotel}. I might watch T.V. before going to bed about 23.30. Written by Nicky Beard for his Dad.
